Articles.Content:
Yes, why wouldn't I?

User below me is posting using a laptop (as opposed to a desktop, phone, potato with a keyboard stuck in etc.)

False. I'm now using a potato with the external appearance of a laptop.

Nope.

The user below me has experienced a kraken.

I planted a flag on the kraken

The user below me isn't lazy.

(I have too! And your Jool looks just like my Jool (Same position) when I landed!)

True.

The user below me will post a "User Below me" post
false. majical 10 char adding

You broke it...

The user below me has at least 2 rep bars.

I wish.

The user below me has seen 1 live rocket launch.

WRONG

the user below me has read all the republic commando books, and the imperial commando book.

Nope.

The user below me is on time.

on time for what, i'm usually early

the user below me is eating something

false.

the user below me will not answer this question

False. I did!

The user below me will type in "Kerbal history Remastered."

Nope.

I don't like those kind of game too much.

True, *imaginary answer*

The user below me imagined what 8-player Ice Climber smash would've been like if they didn't have technical problems.

False.

The user below me will me on the forums when the posts below me.

Um, no offense but I can't understand what you posted, so I'll just say false.

The user below me has a cat.

Not at the moment, but I have in the past.

The user below me owned an 8-bit game console.

Nope, 16-bit's my oldest.

The user below me is blue and throws lemons at people.

*GAAAAHSP* HOW. DID. YOU. FIND. OUT?

nah, im pink-ish and throw little green astronauts to space.

TUBW (The User Below me) saw a Google Glass in real life. (I even used one!)

False. Never seen one. That's what happens when you never go outside.

The person below me has considered running away to fight bears in the Siberian wilderness with the assumed name "Lord Jeffery the Great".

Not until you posted that sentence. Know any good places to buy Russian hunting rifles and a sword of some kind?

The user below hates my boring name .

I care not for name vanity, I care for Bacon.

The user below me has Survived a Kraken attack without needing a rescue ship.

oh yes

user below me likes pears.

user below me likes pears.

Yeah!

The user below me has been to Elbowquirky.
